content.rendered:
Earning a bachelor’s degree at a private university is more affordable than you may think, especially at the University of La Verne. So don’t let the price tag alarm you.

Traditional undergraduate students at the University of La Verne benefit from generous scholarships and financial aid, which can greatly reduce the cost of enrollment.
